Wilddance, I don't know if Talon is what you'd like to be called, thank you 
for your suggestions.  The gestalts have been around in TF history since 
1985.  The Protectobots, The Terrorcons, the Aerialbots, the Stunticons, the 
Combaticons, and the Constructicons.  I think that is all of them.  I was 
born in the early month of January in '87, last year of the TFs.  Kind of 
strange how I know so much of about them.  Anyway, once more, thank you for 
your suggestion, but frankly, and no offense intended, you are one of the 
best RPers in this entire RPG (I've been wondering why you compelled to make 
your posts so long, and I see it is habit), but you are wrong.  A mix between 
fantasy and science fiction has been a great success  numerous times.   Of 
course, as usual when I actually need it, my memory is lacking.  The only 
real success I can currently remember was a cartoon called the Visionaries, 
and that was an extrodinary and popular cartoon.  Anyway, we aren't really 
mixing them anyway.  The Dieties possess no magical powers.  At first, they 
were merely named after some of my favorite mythological gods, but a few 
people made them look like what they were supposed to have (JP, which was 
rather entertainingly surprising).  So all we are mixing are the names and 
appearances, nothing more.  Maybe a few mentionings of events in Greek mythos 
by my part...:)

But, as long as I have a professional writer in my presence (not mocking 
you), I was wondering if you could answer a few questions.  I myself am 
currently striving to become a good author, but I'm only so-so, of course it 
takes time.  But to get back on track, why is it that Earth and Humans aren't 
usually capitalized, I'm pretty sure they are proper nouns.

Thanks,
Unitron
